 English: The prastara of the shrine front abuts on the mandapa ceiling . There are eight such cave-temples in various stages of completion : the Koneri mandapam , the Varaha mandapam , the Mahishamardini mandapam -LRB- locally called Yamapuri mandapam -RRB- , an unfinished cave-temple next to the Koneri mandapam , the Pancha-Pandava mandapam , the Adivaraha cave-temple called Paramesvara Mahavaraha Vishnu-griha in its inscriptions and the Ramanuja mandapam . Of these the Varaha and Ramanuja mandapams have undivided mandapas while the Koneri mandapam and the Adivaraha cave-temple have their mandapas divided into ardha- and mukha-mandapas by an inner line of pillars .
